attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dear Mr. Priminister/Sir...I am only a small minority in the great scheme of things.  I live in supported accommodation run by St Matthew Housing.  Having heard and seen the brutality of president Mugabe's order ? I felt strongly that something should be done.  To see people whipped, beaten and killed is too much.  Surely something must give.  And I hope it's your compassion to help what's left of these people.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
